subject: Extension of time period of panel of Independent Experts of Conciliation Committees of Independent Experts (CCIEs 1 & 2)
text: HRal 7cy TTHRf uifetazrut (Tsw 4Rde7 & rTHNf 4AK4, ARG FRAT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Hrma 74d vf-5 g 6, 7ae7-10, rqT;, 7f fcaft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 TI/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAVPolicy Guidelines/ Dispute Resolution/2024 Policy Circular No_ 2.1.74/ 2024 dated 16th 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD/CCIEExtn./2020-21 (Comp. No. 5472)} Sub: Extension of time period of panel of Independent Experts of Conciliation Committees of Independent Experts (CCIEs 1 & 2) reg: NHAI vide Policy Circular No. 2.1.23/2017 dated 02.06.2017 established a conciliation and settlement mechanism for the early resolution and settlement of claims arising out of the contractual disputes under the contract agreements with the Contractors/ Concessionaires/ Consultants in NHAI. The two Conciliation and Settlement Committees were constituted and   published vide para 4.3 of   Policy Circular 2.1.23/2017 dated 02.06.2017. As per Annexure-1 of the Policy Circular, the panel of Independent Experts approved under these guidelines was valid upto 01.06.2020. 2  At present, the composition of these two Committees are as under: Conciliation & Settlement Committee -1/Conciliation & Settlement Committee-2 Names of the Members Names of the Members Sh Pradeep Kumar Justice L.P. Vasishtha (Retd. 2 Sh. Y.S. Malik 2 ShAK_Upadhyay 3. Sh_Surya Pal Singh_Jain 13 Sh. V V__Ranganathan 3_ The tenure Iterms of the Committees were extended from 02.06.2020 to 01.06.2021 vide Policy Circular dated 02.06.2020, from 02.06.2021 to 01.06.2022 vide Policy Circular dated 24.05.2021 from 02.06.2022 to 01.06.2023 vide Policy Circular dated 18.05.2022 and further extended from 02.06.2023 to 01.06.2024 vide Policy Circular dated 28.04.2023. 4 Now the Competent Authority has extended the tenure/terms of the aforesaid two Committees from 02.06.2024 to 15.06.2024. 5 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
